channel.title: data-engineering on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in data-engineering on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: AI News - Data Collection
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Build a comprehensive data collection and analysis system to track AI industry news, research developments, product launches, and market movements, providing timely insights into the rapidly evolving AI landscape.

item.title: Community Sentiment Analysis - Data Integration and AI
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Develop an AI-powered system that analyzes community interactions across Discord and social media platforms to understand sentiment, needs, and trends within our community, providing actionable insights for community engagement and product development.

item.title: Competitive Market - Data Collection and Analysis
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Develop a comprehensive data collection and analysis system to track competitors, market movements, and industry trends across the technical landscape, providing actionable insights into market positioning and opportunities.

item.title: Consulting Pitch - Data Integration and AI
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Develop an intelligent system that aggregates data about potential clients, market conditions, and our capabilities to generate targeted consulting pitch outlines through LLM analysis, providing customized solutions that address specific client challenges.

item.title: Employee Social Proactivity Analysis - Data Integration and AI
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Develop a two-phase system that first collects and aggregates data from public Discord channels, then uses analytics and LLMs to evaluate employee social engagement patterns, providing insights into community participation and impact.

item.title: Global Tech Radar - Data Collection and Analysis
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Build a data-driven system to track and analyze the adoption, maturity, and stability of technologies across the global tech ecosystem, creating a dynamic tech radar that provides real-time insights into technology trends.

item.title: Internal Tech Radar - Data Analysis and Science
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Develop an AI-powered system that analyzes internal communications and documentation to automatically maintain and update an internal Tech Radar, providing insights into technology adoption, success patterns, and challenges within the organization.

item.title: Sourcing App Ideas - Data Collection and Insights
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Develop a comprehensive data collection and analysis system to identify viable app ideas by aggregating and analyzing user pain points and feature requests from multiple platforms.

item.title: Sourcing Hiring Demand - Data Collection
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Build a data collection and analysis system to identify hiring trends and demands across multiple job platforms, providing insights into market needs and skill requirements.

item.title: Tech Events - Data Collection
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Develop a comprehensive system to collect, aggregate, and analyze tech event data from multiple sources, providing insights into industry trends, popular topics, and networking opportunities.

item.title: Tech Funding - Data Collection
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Build a comprehensive data collection and analysis system to track funding flows across technology domains, providing insights into investment patterns, emerging fields, and market confidence in different technology sectors.

item.title: Project Charter, Handover, and Report Integration Bounty
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Create an integrated system that combines Notion and Slack data to enhance project reporting through Dify workflows.

item.title: Project JIRA Data Collection Bounty
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This bounty focuses on developing a privacy-first data collection system for JIRA, ensuring we can gather valuable insights while respecting user privacy and project policies.

item.title: Project Notion Data Collection Bounty
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This bounty focuses on developing a privacy-conscious data collection system for Notion, ensuring we can gather valuable insights while respecting user privacy and workspace policies.

item.title: Project Slack Data Collection Bounty
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This bounty focuses on developing a privacy-first data collection system for Slack, ensuring we can gather valuable insights while respecting user privacy and workspace policies.

item.title: Project Telegram Data Collection Bounty
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This bounty focuses on developing a privacy-first data collection system for Telegram, ensuring we can gather valuable insights while respecting user privacy and channel/group policies using the MTProto protocol.

item.title: Building a Data-Driven Project Reporting System: A Lens into Modern Data Engineering
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Picture yourself as a skilled carpenter who’s mastered building beautiful furniture, only to be asked to construct an entire house.

item.title: Google Data Fusion
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction Google Data Fusion is a fully managed, cloud-native data integration service that enables users to efficiently build and manage ETL/ELT data pipelines.

item.title: Google Dataproc
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction Google Dataproc is a fast and easy-to-use, fully managed cloud service for running Apache Spark and Hadoop workloads. It allows users to process and analyze large-scale data efficiently and at scale.

item.title: SQL and how it relates to Disk Reads and Writes
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What are random and sequential reads and writes? Random and sequential reads and writes refer to the way data is accessed, read, and written on hard disks
